item.description:
Buffy Sainte-Marie, k d lang,

Walter Hyatt, Pokey LaFarge

and Keb' Mo' —

all on the same podcast?

 

You know it, bro!

The new edition of

The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour

is online now.

Check out Jim Lauderdale!

 

How about music from a retiring legend?

Hey — EmmyLou Harris!

 

What about a classic americana collaboration?

Check out a great Dave Alvin-Jimmie Dale Gilmore duet!

 

All genres, all eras — all great.

Click now to listen.

And crank it!

 

— M.D.

item.itunes:title: The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour No. 480
item.description:
Judy Collins, Randy Travis,

Alison Krauss and the O'Jays —

Want some Christianity in your Christmas?

How about noy one, but two renditions of "Amazing Grace?"

 

How's about Christmas cheer for the kiddies?

Hey — Randy Travis with Jingle Bell Rock?

 

Up for some Christmas blues?

Check out Charles Brown

with "Please Come Home for Christmas."

 

And let's not forget the kids — and their future!

How about John Lennon and Yoko Ono. backed by

The Harlem Boys Choir

with

"Happy Christmas (War is Over)?"

 

All genres, all eras — all great!

And all free, as well.

 

Click now to listen.

And crank it!

 

— M.D.

item.title: The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour No. 475
item.itunes:title: The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour No. 475
item.description:
Waylon Jennings, Crystal Gayle,

and Art Garfunkel — all on

the same podcast?

 

Righty-O!

The new edition of

The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour

is online now!

 

Love classic doo-wop?

How about The Flamingos with

"I Only Have Eyes for You?"

 

How 'bout some

fine americana humor?

Check out I See Hawks in LA!

 

Care for a couple of songs

about female self-pleasure?

 

Well, we got two in a row!

Cyndi Lauper and then  The Divynils — messin' with

themselves and having fun!

 

Music ranging from 1944 (The Mills Brothers)

right up to several from 2025.

 

All genres, all era — all great.

And all free, as well!

 

Click now to listen.

And crank it!

 

— M.D.

item.title: The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour No. 474
item.itunes:title: The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour No. 474
item.description:
Cheryl Wheeler, Lucy Kaplansky,

The Mavericks, and Etta James —

all on the same podcast?

 

Oh, yes!

The new edition of

The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour

is online now!

 

All that, PLUS

a special tribute to

the late Jesse Winchester,

one of the finest American songwriters

of all time.

 

Love great soul?

How about Clarence Carter?

 

The blues light your fire?

Hey — Keb' Mo'!

 

Classic country float your boat?

What about Connie Francis?

 

How about great American jazz?

Well ... Count Basie!

Not to mention Sarah Vaughan.

 

All eras, all genres — all great.

And all free as well!

 

Click now to listen.

And crank it!

 

— M.D.

item.description:
Janis Joplin, Little Feat,

Grey DeLisle and Taj Mahal —

on the same podcast?

 

Indeed!

The new edition of

The Big Fat Wide Americana Hour

is online now!

 

Love your blues deep?

We're playing Bessie Smith!

Well — Buffalo Springfield!

 

Super blues work for you?

Taj Mahal's one of the best ever.

 

How about vocals that blow the hat right off your head?

I mean, Joe Cocker!

 

All genres, all eras — all great.

And all free, as well!

 

Click now to listen.

And crank it!

 

— M.D.
